title: Wing Drone Delivery in 2024: ‘Capable Of Handling Tens Of Millions Of Deliveries For Millions Of Consumers’
description: Wing is clearly looking to scale significantly soon. While the company has completed 300,000 deliveries to date, Woodworth is preparing to go big: tens of millions of deliveries for millions of customers. Essentially, that means normalizing drone delivery for the masses.

title: Why I Bank(ed?) with SVB, and Will Again
description: At SVB I've always had the kind of banking experience you only see in movies.  It needs to be saved.

title: Rocket Launch Visible To 100 Million Will Look Like A Speeding Star Saturday
description: There’s a new sight to see in the skies over the eastern seaboard of the United States courtesy of Rocket Lab and NASA.

title: AI Inference Processes Data And Augments Human Abilities
description: AI provides ways to process the vast amounts of data by creating models and running them on inference engines in devices and at the network edge.  Brainchip and Hailo recently announced neural network-based AI inference devices that could augment human abilities.

title: Why Mayor Eric Adams Told New York City Shoppers To Lower Face Masks Despite Covid-19
description: On a 1010 WINS radio interview on Monday, NYC Mayor Eric Adams urged, “We are putting out a clear call to all of our shops, do not allow people to enter the store without taking off their face mask.”

title: Medicare Doesn’t Pay For Obesity Drugs: Lifting This Coverage Prohibition Faces Considerable Hurdles
description: To increase Medicare access to obesity drugs, lawmakers, advocacy groups and drug makers are pushing for a law to lift a decades-old prohibition on Medicare coverage of weight-loss drugs. Backers of the proposed legislation hope the emergence of more effective drugs will enable momentum for passage.

title: Reimagining Alzheimer’s (Part 8): APOE4 Removal Reduces Symptoms Of Alzheimer’s Disease
description: New research in mice suggests that removing the APOE4 gene dramatically reduces the incidence of Alzheimer’s disease.

title: Wearing Sports Bras Too Long Led To This TikToker’s Breast Health Scare
description: Here's how to prevent such a problem from happening.

title: Apple HomePod 3: Insider Leaks Remarkable Smart Speaker Coming
description: A new HomePod is being developed, Ming-Chi Kuo says, which will look very different from the current smart speaker.

title: Cochrane Says Review Does Not Show That ‘Face Masks Don’t Work’ Against Covid-19
description: Karla Soares-Weiser, Editor-in-Chief of the Cochrane Library, emphasized, “Many commentators have claimed that a recently-updated Cochrane Review shows that ‘masks don't work,’ which is an inaccurate and misleading interpretation.”

title: The 5 SVB Critical Questions And Answers For Biotech
description: Six months ago, I wrote in Forbes how the Fed’s Inflation fight would harm Biotech.  With the FDIC takeover of Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) using the receiver, Deposit Insurance National Bank of Santa Clara the judgement has proven to be correct. And what could happen next may be even more disruptive.

title: Demo Shows ChatGPT Aiding Predator Preying On 13 Year Old Girl
description: A little over a week ago Snapchat integrated ChatGPT into its service and it's already helping children find their way into dangerous situations.

title: Current Climate: The Young Entrepreneurs And Scientists Working To Save The Planet
description: This week’s Current Climate, which every Saturday brings you the latest news about the business of sustainability.

title: New Apple Leak Reveals iPhone 15 Essential Upgrade
description: Apple's iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max are receiving and essential and overdue upgrade...

title: Shaq May Be Hiding In His House To Avoid FTX Lawsuit
description: At the height of its prestige, the crypto exchange FTX had no larger celebrity endorsement than that of famed basketballer Shaquille O’Neal, who promoted the company through commercials and events, and is now being sued for his alleged role in persuading customers to invest with FTX.

title: When Is Easter 2023 And Why Does The Date Change Every Year?
description: The intriguing link between Easter, the spring Equinox and the “Pink Moon,” which this year will also be called the “Paschal Moon.”
